data.name: ReadCsenetTransactionEnvelop
data.value: select top(1) CCA_TRANSACTION_DT, CCA_TRANS_SER_NUM, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TIMES, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TSTAMP from CKT_CSENET_TRN_ENV where (CCA_TRANS_SER_NUM = @ccaTransSerNum) and (CCA_TRANSACTION_DT = @ccaTransactionDt)

data.name: ReadInterstateCase
data.value: select top(1) TRANS_SERIAL_NBR, TRANSACTION_DATE, ASSN_DEACT_DT, ASSN_DEACT_IND from CKT_INTERST_CASE where (TRANS_SERIAL_NBR = @transSerialNbr) and (TRANSACTION_DATE = @transactionDate)

data.name: ReadInterstateCaseAssignment
data.value: select DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, ICS_DATE, ICS_NO from CKT_ASSGN_INT_CASE where (@icsNo = ICS_NO) and (@icsDate = ICS_DATE)

data.name: UpdateCsenetTransactionEnvelop
data.value: update CKT_CSENET_TRN_ENV set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TIMES = @lastUpdatedTimes where (CCA_TRANSACTION_DT = @ccaTransactionDt) and (CCA_TRANS_SER_NUM = @ccaTransSerNum)

data.name: UpdateInterstateCase
data.value: update CKT_INTERST_CASE set ASSN_DEACT_DT = @assnDeactDt, ASSN_DEACT_IND = @assnDeactInd where (TRANS_SERIAL_NBR = @transSerialNbr) and (TRANSACTION_DATE = @transactionDate)

data.name: UpdateInterstateCaseAssignment
data.value: update CKT_ASSGN_INT_CASE set DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp) and (SPD_ID = @spdId) and (OFF_ID = @offId) and (OSP_CODE = @ospCode) and (OSP_DATE = @ospDate) and (ICS_DATE = @icsDate) and (ICS_NO = @icsNo)
